title: CALL US > PET FRIENDLY! Historic Upscale Neighborhood & Awesome Amens
posting_body: ['Enjoy The Good Life...', 'Welcome Home!', 'Seize your chance to live in The Irvington, one of the most iconic apartment communities in Portland, OR.', 'The Irvington', 'show contact info', '1532 NE 21st Avenue', 'Portland OR 97232', 'Bed: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Rent: 1449', 'Got some downtime and need to unwind?', 'If you want somewhere serene to clear your head, you need look no further than our smoke-free community with long private balconies, gated off-street parking, free bike storage, and parcel lockers.', 'With easy access to I-84 and I-5, The Irvington is just minutes away from Downtown Portland and The Pearl District.', 'If you just need to get away and enjoy the city’s offerings, explore all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby downtown Portland has to offer!', 'At The Irvington, we get that life can sometimes get hectic, busy, or just downright stressful.', 'Your home is your castle and a place to unwind and relax.', 'Live next-door to the heart of Portland’s hustle and bustle!', 'Our Amenities', 'Historic Irvington Neighborhood', 'Alarm System', 'Floor to Ceiling Windows', 'New Carpet in the Bedroom', 'Convenient Laundry Facility in Building', 'Cat-friendly', 'Controlled Access Building Entry', 'Sliding Glass Patio Doors*', 'All New Brushed Nickel Lighting, Fixtures, and Hardware', 'Interior Parcel Lockers and mail boxes', 'New Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Kitchen Island that doubles as a Breakfast Bar', 'Abundant Closet Space Throughout', 'Gated Covered or Uncovered Parking*', 'Maple Soft-Close Cabinets', 'Private Deck / Patio with Living Room and Bedroom Access', 'Walk Score 89, Bike Score 100', 'FREE Bike Storage', 'Professionally Managed by Princeton Property Management', 'Our Walk Score of 87 makes us as a “Very Walkable” location and our Bike Score of 100 makes us a “Biker’s Paradise”.', 'Rest assured, you can explore the area and nearby Portland with or without a car.', 'The Irvington offers something for everyone.', 'See our available amenities to find something that speaks to you.', 'Get a sneak peek of the good life here at The Irvington.', 'Our community offers you the very best of the city from the peaceful confines of the historic Irvington and Sullivan’s Gulch neighborhoods.', 'We offer our residents a myriad of top-notch amenities to make life that much easier so that you have more time to kick back.', 'The Irvington provides residents with roomy one-bedroom apartment floor plans with modern design and filled with closets, so you can find the home that fits your lifestyle for years to come.']
